Annéria du Plessis

I am a hardworking, motivated individual. Challenges excite me and I have experience in writing custom code for creative and large scale sites. My passion is semantic, modular code, always keeping best practices in mind. I pride myself in attention to detail, being neat, and having a good eye for design principles.
